actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Northern Paiute Nation by the Indian Claims Commission in docket No. 87.

summary.text: Provides for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Northern Paiute Nation of Nevada by the Indian claims Commission in docket numbered 87.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Northern Paiute Nation by the Indian Claims Commission in docket No. 87.
